rows.HOW TO USE THIS MODEL: Operator onboarding to the spreadsheet itself
FIRST TIME SETUP (Day 1)
1. Read "0. Start Here" tab completely
2. Read "Grand Unifying Dictionary" - learn our terms
3. Read "The Equations" - understand the business math
4. Read "The Games" - understand strategic principles
5. Read "Win Criteria Definition" - know what winning looks like
6. Read "Game Physics Rulebook" - know the rules
7. Skim all tab names to understand scope
8. Ask Claude any questions about concepts
DAILY USE
• Check "Key Metrics Dashboard" first thing
• Log any decisions in "Decision Log"
• Update "Changes Tracker" if anything changes
• Reference specific tabs for SOPs/playbooks as needed
• Use "Grand Unifying Dictionary" when terms are unclear
WEEKLY USE
• Update all "Data Freshness: Weekly" tabs (see Data Freshness Requirements)
• Run "Cross-Tab Validation" check
• Review "Red Flag Dashboard" for any kill criteria approaching
• Update "Paradigm Shift Log" if any major changes
• Archive previous week's reports
FINDING THINGS
• Strategy questions:
• How to do X:
• Who owns what:
• What a term means:
• Current status:
rows.col_2: Key Metrics Dashboard, Cash Flow Monitoring

rows.HOW TO USE THIS MODEL: • What to do next:
GOLDEN RULES
1. Never delete tabs - archive if obsolete
2. Log every decision in Decision Log
3. Update Changes Tracker when modifying any tab
4. Use exact terms from Grand Unifying Dictionary
5. Check Tab Ownership before editing someone else's tab
6. Run Cross-Tab Validation after major updates
